articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Urgent action needed as malaria evolves resistance to key drug - BBC.com
articles.description: Malaria parasites that can shrug off the effects of artemisinin are now well-established in East Africa.
articles.content:
A similar story has happened before. The parasite became resistant to a previous drug - chloroquine - in East Africa in the 1970s, and resistance reached the west coast by the 1980s. 
Malaria deaths… [+1604 chars]
